Third: number difference body affliction purifier: empowerment four.
01 06 12 01
[9015-9019] Structural framework establishing fourfold elaborated empowerment taxonomy: elaborate with elaborate, elaborate without elaborate, unelaborated, and fully complete. The four aspects—external preparation, internal mandala offering, secret protection cord with kusha grass, fully complete dream examination—map onto body, speech, mind, and pristine awareness dimensions. Structural function: systematic enumeration of empowerments as graduated introduction to recognition. View register: empowerment as maturation process, not external power conferral. Translation risk: numerical taxonomy appearing scholastic abstraction rather than functional progression. Preservation: fourfold structure mirrors four empowerments throughout.
[9020-9026] Unelaborated empowerment external components: washing ritual, supplication, three vajra callings. Internal: samaya oath-water administering, samsara abandoning oath, nirvana accepting oath, four negating oaths. Structural function: progressive refinement from outer to inner, elaborate to essential. View register: samaya as continuity of recognition, not moralistic commitment. Translation risk: oath suggesting binding contract rather than recognition-support. Preservation: mna' carries binding force, but binding to awareness nature, not external obligation.
[9027-9033] Secret and fully complete components enumeration. Secret: samaya and vow bestowal, mandala entering, mind-flower offering. Fully complete: mandala entering, deity face revealing, flower throwing, name empowerment. Structural function: ritual architecture maintaining coherence across elaboration levels. View register: ritual elements as skillful means supporting recognition, not ends in themselves. Translation risk: procedural description losing contemplative depth. Preservation: each element points to nature of mind, not mere ceremonial step.
[9034-9047] Very unelaborated external enumeration across nine vehicles begins. Shravaka: mandala entering, path stages indication, upper and lower garments, alms bowl and water vessel, discipline terminology, grounds and paths, action distinctions, dependent arising indication, meditation transmission, prophecy. Pratyekabuddha and Bodhisattva vehicles follow with reduced component counts. Structural function: systematic reduction mapping vehicle capacity to empowerment complexity. View register: graduated vehicles as expressions of single intention, different methods for different capacities. Translation risk: hierarchical reading as lower/higher value judgment rather than skillful means. Preservation: numerical reduction represents progressive refinement, not superiority hierarchy.
[9048-9056] Internal empowerment enumeration: Kriya vehicle mandala entering, mind generation, samaya acceptance, flower throwing, deity face showing, name empowerment, prophecy, encouragement, breath emission, empowerment proper. Structural function: internal corresponds to secret dimension, more subtle than external. View register: internal<span class="term">/external distinction maps to subtle/</span>gross, not hidden/revealed. Translation risk: internal suggesting esoteric hierarchy. Preservation: internal refers to subtle body and energy dimensions, not secrecy.
[9057-9068] Upa and Yoga vehicles enumeration continues, twenty-seven components for Upa, nine for Yoga. Secret empowerment: Mahayoga prophecy, mandala entering, deity face showing, flower throwing, name empowerment, hearing, explanation, benefit, power, awareness empowerment, branch empowerment, particular empowerment—twelve components. Structural function: mathematical completeness demonstrating systematic coverage. View register: enumeration expresses enlightened mind's all-inclusiveness. Translation risk: mathematical precision appearing arbitrary. Preservation: numbers carry symbolic weight—twelve corresponds to complete mandala structure.
[9069-9076] Anuyoga and Atiyoga enumeration: Anuyoga mandala entering, certain sign indication, breath emission, seal transformation, activity performance, certain entering—six components. Fully complete: Atiyoga mandala entering, meditation certainty mandala flower throwing, deity face showing empowerment, result separation-completeness empowerment—four components. Structural function: progressive reduction to essence, four components mirroring four empowerments. View register: Atiyoga includes and transcends all vehicles, simplest form most profound. Translation risk: simplicity appearing superficial. Preservation: four represents completion, not reduction to insignificance.
[9077-9090] Elaborate without elaborate external: four gates directional entering—east gate entering shows emptiness of path, south gate entering shows emptiness of mind, west gate entering shows afflictions self-liberated in emptiness, north gate entering shows karma and habitual tendencies emptiness exhaustion. Structural function: four gates correspond to four directions, four activities, four empowerments. View register: directional symbolism mapping to wisdom dimensions. Translation risk: directional reading appearing geographical rather than symbolic. Preservation: four gates represent four ways of entering recognition.
[9091-9104] Internal elaborate without elaborate: sexual union entry, bodhicitta three-letter sound, mirror taking, vajra-lotus-wheel three visualization, disciple tongue placement, body speech emptiness—six components. Secret: bliss, bodhicitta actual blessing, body speech mind three, secret and secret-worthy, secret focusing—six components. Structural function: sexual yoga components require precise technical rendering. View register: bliss and emptiness union, not mere sexuality. Translation risk: literal sexual reading losing symbolic dimension. Preservation: technical terms—byang sems, rdo rje, padma, 'khor lo—retain tantric precision.
[9105-9116] Mathematical summary begins: elaborate with elaborate external six, internal one, secret two, fully complete two—total six. Elaborate without elaborate external three, internal four, secret four, fully complete four—total fifteen. Structural function: mathematical accounting demonstrates systematic completeness. View register: numerical precision expresses completeness of enlightened display. Translation risk: mathematics appearing scholastic abstraction. Preservation: each number corresponds to specific mandala structure or completion aspect.
[9117-9130] Very unelaborated totals: external Shravaka six, Pratyekabuddha five making eleven, Bodhisattva four making fifteen. Internal Kriya nine making twenty-four, Upa nine making thirty-three, Yoga nine making forty-two. Secret Mahayoga twelve making fifty-four, Anuyoga six making sixty. Fully complete Atiyoga four making sixty-four elaborate external empowerments. Structural function: cumulative totaling shows comprehensiveness. View register: sixty-four represents complete mandala structure. Translation risk: totaling appearing accounting exercise. Preservation: sixty-four equals eight times eight, mandala completion number.
[9131-9142] Elaborate without elaborate totals: external guru and disciple activities, mandala and vase—four. Secret mandala excellence explanation five, vase excellence five—total ten. Combined with previous four—fourteen. Fully complete teacher name indication, disciple power generation—two, total sixteen. Structural function: component breakdown shows structural logic. View register: guru-disciple dynamic central to empowerment transmission. Translation risk: power generation suggesting external power transfer. Preservation: stobbs skyed refers to confidence or capacity generation, not power in conventional sense.
[9143-9164] Unelaborated enumeration: external A training unborn path cultivation, A accomplishment unobstructed flow clearing, A gathering body speech mind purification—three. Internal washing showing purification method, mandala offering accomplishing desired aims, scripture transmission knowing engagement—three. Secret mandala entering introducing rigpa to space, deity face pointing out space-rigpa, name empowerment making buddha-son—three. Fully complete prophecy through verses showing nondual experience, breath emission showing unborn recognition, encouragement showing nondual great bliss—three. Total twelve. Preservation: A carries ontological weight—unproduced, source of all.
[9165-9177] Very unelaborated and extremely unelaborated structures. Very unelaborated external: worthy of entering, worthy of obtaining—two. Internal: certain activity, certain view—two. Secret: family differentiation, self-abiding—two. Fully complete: cause and condition pair—two. Extremely unelaborated external: mind abiding, speech abiding—two. Internal: speech transforming, mind obtaining—two. Secret: bliss prophecy, secret breath emission—two. Fully complete: dwelling in emanation, obtaining own activity—two. Structural function: progressive reduction to dyadic structures. View register: ultimate refinement to essential recognition. Translation risk: minimal description appearing incomplete. Preservation: numerical reduction represents progressive refinement to essence, not impoverishment.
[9178-9193] Summary totals across all categories: elaborate with elaborate 115, elaborate without elaborate 64, unelaborated 109, very unelaborated 94, extremely unelaborated 30, total 412 empowerments. Alternative enumerations: 94 very unelaborated through different counting, variations for unelaborated 109. Structural function: mathematical totality demonstrating comprehensive coverage. View register: multiplicity serving unity, different pedagogical frameworks for different capacities. Translation risk: varying totals appearing inconsistent. Preservation: different counting systems serve different purposes, demonstrating teaching adaptability.
[9194-9210] Shin tu spros med—very unelaborated—external components: grain mandala increasing enjoyment, scent field expansion, flower sense clarity, jewel abundance expansion—four. Internal: family drawing bliss experience, verbal expression generation—two, total six. Secret: mandala entering with four directional gate meanings—east gate emptiness of path, south gate emptiness of mind, west gate afflictions self-liberated, north gate karma and habitual tendencies emptiness exhaustion—four, total ten. Preservation: each gate represents specific entry point to recognition.
[9211-9222] Fully complete: rigpa flower throwing mind dissolution key, breath emission, prophecy—two, total twelve. Structural function: rigpa flower throwing marks culmination. View register: rigpa recognition as ultimate empowerment. Translation risk: flower throwing appearing ritualistic. Preservation: me tog dor ba represents pointing-out, not mere ceremony.
[9223-9241] Rab tu spros med—extremely unelaborated—external: body postures eleven obtaining abiding. Internal: mind with twelve cutting samsara wheel twelve continuums. Secret: mind itself unborn, deity face showing, mind seven empowerments obtaining, seven ignorance fields cutting—thirty. Fully complete: instruction divisions six, pure aggregates four—eleven, combined thirty-one. Structural function: body-mind-posture correlations. View register: posture supporting recognition. Translation risk: posture appearing merely physical. Preservation: 'dug stangs carries contemplative weight.
[9242-9261] Rab tu spros med calculation summary: eighteen elaborate with elaborate, twelve unelaborated making thirty, twelve very unelaborated making forty-two, eleven extremely unelaborated making fifty-three. Very unelaborated forty-eight making one hundred one. Unelaborated sixteen elaborate with elaborate, twelve unelaborated making twenty-eight, eight very unelaborated making thirty-six, eight extremely unelaborated making forty-four. Elaborate with elaborate fifteen making two hundred fifty-nine total. Alternative: two hundred forty-nine. Structural function: mathematical precision demonstrates systematic mind. [9262-9278] Further calculation: four times four body speech mind indivisible with past, future, present, uncertain—four times making two hundred eighty-nine. Thirty-two times thirty-two equals one thousand thirty-six. With twelve body types, defilements calculation: ten thousand, three thousand, six hundred thirty-two. Defilements same calculation: ten thousand, half, seven hundred—minus two thousand nine hundred seventy-two excess referring to karma collection. Structural function: complex numerology reflecting tantric cosmology. View register: mathematical universe reflecting enlightened order. Translation risk: numerology appearing arbitrary. [9279-9294] Wind element purification appendix: four elements' wind sequence—wind, water-wind, fire-wind, wind-wind. Four winds each with four characteristics—spreading, penetrating, equalizing, disturbing—sixteen. Each divided male female making thirty-six. Half activity purification. Structural function: subtle body physiology integrated with empowerment. View register: winds as vehicle for recognition. Translation risk: physiological description appearing anatomical. Preservation: rlung carries energetic and contemplative dimensions.
[9295-9314] Results of completed empowerment: temporary and final. Path qualities general presentation and vidyadhara four levels particular presentation. Temporary: elaborate completes accumulation path twelve virtues, unelaborated completes preparation path four certainties, very unelaborated completes seeing path, extremely unelaborated completes meditation path nine. Faith, entering, transforming, cutting four grounds correspond to four empowerments completing sixteen ground virtues. Structural function: path-ground-empowerment correlation mapping. View register: empowerments as support for path progression. Translation risk: sequential reading suggesting causal development. Preservation: path completion through recognition, not temporal progression.
[9315-9345] Four grounds detailed: elaborate with elaborate faith ground—devotion and merit distinction. Unelaborated entering pure ground—faith certainty autonomous entering. Very unelaborated transforming actual-purity ground—body speech binding non-abiding. Extremely unelaborated karma-end cutting ground—elaboration and samsara non-abiding. Three remaining empowerments similarly mapped: faith's faith certainty through compassion, entering's shamatha and vipasyana, transforming's appearance transformation, cutting's result cutting. Structural function: sixteen-fold matrix showing comprehensive coverage. View register: all aspects of practice included. Translation risk: matrix appearing mechanical. Preservation: systematic inclusion demonstrates completeness.
[9346-9367] Vidyadhara four levels: yoga ground, great yoga ground, discerning yoga ground, realized yoga ground. Each divided controlled and uncontrolled making eight. Subdivided: yoga ground four—yoga, action yoga, conduct yoga, transforming yoga. Great yoga ground four—great yoga, own ground certainty yoga, elaboration yoga, separation-completion yoga. Discerning yoga ground four—sign ground, meaning ground, sign-meaning indivisible ground, unmixed ground. Realized yoga ground four—magical display ground, distinction realization ground, manifest arising ground, hero family discerning ground—total sixteen. Structural function: vidyadhara levels map to empowerment completion stages. View register: vidyadhara as maturation level, not hierarchical status. Translation risk: levels suggesting spiritual hierarchy. Preservation: sa indicates ground or foundation, not rank.
[9368-9396] First ground seven miracles: body hundred thousand emanations, those limbs hundred thousand emanations, one body thousand heads, hundred thousand bodies one head, one head different bodies hundred thousand emanating emanations, body heads limbs immeasurable emanations, various births emanation—from empowerment controlled ground realization. Second ground seven abilities: showing internal organs, upper body fire lower water, limbs severed scattering four directions, sense powers falling to ground, body power throwing mountains, ocean lifting to sky, planets falling—empowerment time seven branches preceded. Third ground seven abilities: wind lasso binding, beings' minds transforming, world protector gods taming, dakini minds captivating, beings hundred liberating, gods and nagas enjoying, great Shiva power debilitating—empowerment time mind generation. Structural function: miraculous abilities as empowerment results. View register: siddhis as byproducts, not goals. Translation risk: powers appearing as achievements. Preservation: rdzu 'phrul demonstrates liberation capacity, not power accumulation.
[9397-9408] Fourth through sixteenth grounds seven abilities each: four elements transformation, five elements, space vajra transformation, seven bodhi branches, seven dharmas, seven horse-clouds, seven monk-coolers, seven god mansions, seven world realms, seven yidams, seven goddesses—nineteen from empowerments completion. Sixteen grounds hundred miracles called vidyadhara ground. Structural function: systematic enumeration of attainments. View register: complete manifestation capacity through recognition. Translation risk: enumeration appearing boastful. Preservation: comprehensive demonstration of liberation's scope.
[9409-9427] Four vidyadhara types: maturation vidyadhara—mind deity maturation but body unmaturation, liberation in bardo. Life control—same liberation. Great seal—body mind deity maturation. Spontaneous accomplishment—self-other benefit both accomplished. Sixteen previous apply. Maturation: without interruption life that life control obtained, result obtained. Life control: one great eon miracles trained, Vajradhara ground obtained. Great seal: hundred years Vajradhara ground obtained. Spontaneous accomplishment: thousand years Vajradhara ground obtained, four activities benefit. Structural function: four vidyadharas as fruition categories. View register: maturation levels corresponding to recognition stability. Translation risk: temporal frames appearing literal. Preservation: time indicates stability depth, not clock time.
[9428-9448] Four activities: pacifying, enriching, magnetizing, wrathful. Elaborate with elaborate performs pacifying—actual body-mind obstacles and subtle-gross defilements purification. Divisions: pacifying's pacifying—consciousness and wind; pacifying's enriching—life and merit; pacifying's magnetizing—body speech power; pacifying's wrathful—two pacified one abiding. Unelaborated completes enriching. Very unelaborated completes magnetizing. Extremely unelaborated completes wrathful. Detailed divisions for each. Structural function: four activities completing four empowerment types. View register: activities as natural expressions, not forced actions. Translation risk: activities appearing as techniques. Preservation: 'phrin las refers to enlightened activity, not ordinary action.
[9449-9469] Temporary attainment qualities: elaborate with elaborate—body qualities, long life, health, kind conduct, merit endowed, miracles accomplishment, body dust mote seeing. Unelaborated—dharma wheel turning, pleasant to others' ears, teaching listening, treatise composition authority, non-human languages knowing. Very unelaborated—mind purification, concentration, awareness, anything contemplated dharmata arising, four times one time realization, death-transition and birth knowing. Extremely unelaborated—mind workable, clairvoyance, life immeasurable blessing. Structural function: qualities corresponding to empowerment type. View register: qualities as natural manifestations, not achievements. Translation risk: qualities appearing as rewards. Preservation: yon tan indicates functioning, not possession.
[9470-9483] Particularly four empowerments four appearances qualities obtained: elaborate with elaborate dharmata direct appearance, unelaborated experience enhancement, very unelaborated awareness measurement arrival, extremely unelaborated dharmata exhausted appearance. [9484-9505] Final result: Lord Vajradhara ground, body speech mind inexhaustible ornament mandala virtues completion. Divisions: body-wisdom indivisible field brief presentation, inconceivable distinctions extensive explanation, clairvoyance immeasurable control. First: four empowerments completion results four signs, four measures—twelve. Maturation signs four bodies—sixteen. Four wisdoms—twenty. Wisdom light rays four—twenty-four. [9506-9517] Four bodies four wisdoms: abiding ground wisdom, characteristics holding wisdom, all-knowing wisdom, all-aspects knowing wisdom—four each sixteen. Wisdom knowing four each sixteen, total thirty-two called body-wisdom enumerations thirty-two. These complete Vajradhara ground sixteen with sixteen wisdom objects.
